title: Instructional Design Competency Enhancement for Online Mathematics Lecture Planning and Operation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Course emphasizing development of competencies in designing and operating learner-tailored online math lectures

learning_goals: By applying qualitative research methodologies, learners can establish effective instructional design plans for online mathematics lectures.
In real-time online settings, learners can utilize three or more instructional strategies to increase engagement in small learner groups.
Through project-based assessments, learners can systematically analyze the development of individual mathematical competencies.

resources: Digital Content Production Template for Mathematics Education

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
